Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Player of the game "Maestri del Rinascimento". Each client connected to the game is represented by a Player instance. It contains an instance of PersonalBoard, that has the informations about the deposits and strongbox of the player and about the DevelopCards that he has.

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used when the player wants to discard a leader.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the leader to discard in the ArrayList
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when the position is wrong or when the selected leader is already active (so it can't be discarded)

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used when the player wants to activate a leader.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the leader to activate in the ArrayList
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when the position is wrong or when the selected leader is already discarded(so it can't be activated). Also, it can be thrown if the player doesn't have the needed requirements to activate the selected leader

    • produce

      public void produce​(Message info) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used when a player wants to activate production.
      Parameters:
      info - this map contains the info about the productions that the player wants to activate (such as what productions he wants to activate, where to take the resources, etc.)
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when the player selected a DevelopCard slot that does not contain a card or if one of the chosen productions can't be executed (no resources, wrong positions from where to take them, etc.)

    • baseProduction

      private void baseProduction​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> info, ResourceAmount[] inputStrongbox, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceAmount> deps, ResourceAmount[] outputStrongbox) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used inside the produce() method when a player wants to activate the base production (printed on the personal board in the physical game). It removes the selected input resources from the selected places and adds a selected output resource in the outputStrongbox
      Parameters:
      info - this map contains the info about the selected resources and the place from where to take them
      inputStrongbox - this is the strongbox where to retrieve the resources if needed
      deps - these are the deposits where to retrieve the resources if needed
      outputStrongbox - this is the strongbox where to put the produced resource
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when some Invalid Action occurs

    • parseChoice

      private int parseChoice​(java.lang.String chosen)
      Simple utility method used in baseProduction() to retrieve the index of a deposit (or the strongbox) correspondent to the selected place.
      Parameters:
      chosen - the place (deposit/strongbox) from where to take the resources
      Returns:
      the index correspondent to the selected place [0-5] (if incorrect input, -1)

    • receiveInitialFaith

      public void receiveInitialFaith​(int faith)
      This method increases the player's initial position.
      Parameters:
      faith - is the player's initial faith.

    • receiveInitialResource

      public void receiveInitialResource​(int numberInitialResource)
      This method sets the player's numberInitialResource.
      Parameters:
      numberInitialResource - is the number of resources the player will receive when the game starts.

    • chooseInitialResource

      public void chooseInitialResource​(Message info) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for getting the player's initial resources.
      Parameters:
      info - is where the instruction on the turns are stored.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • receiveLeaders

      public void receiveLeaders​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards)
      This method is used for assigning 4 Leader Cards to the Player.
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - is the arraylist of LeaderCards

    • chooseLeader

      public void chooseLeader​(int leader1, int leader2) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used to let the Player choose which Leader Cards he wants to keep.
      Parameters:
      leader1 - is the index [0-1] of the first Leader Card
      leader2 - is the index [0-1] of the second Leader Card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when a wrong index is given (only [0-1] accepted)

    • swapDeposit

      public void swapDeposit​(Message info) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for swapping deposits.
      Parameters:
      info - is where the information is stored.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • buy

      public boolean buy​(Message info, DevelopCard card) throws InvalidActionException, java.lang.NumberFormatException
      This method is used for buying a card.
      Parameters:
      info - is where the instructions are stored.
      card - is the card to buy.
      Returns:
      if the played bought the seventh card.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the input format is not valid.

    • fromMarket

      public int fromMarket​(Message info, Marble[] marbles) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used when a Player wants to take resources from the Market
      Parameters:
      info - is where the instructions are stored.
      marbles - is the array of Marbles that has been selected
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when an invalid action occurs

    • parseColor

      private Color parseColor​(java.lang.String color)
      Utility method used for parsing the color from the map.
      Parameters:
      color - is the color in form of a string.
      Returns:
      the color in form of a Color type.

    • clearLeaders

      protected void clearLeaders()
      Just for testing
